Uses of Class
rekit.logic.Collidable.Optional

Packages that use Collidable.Optional
Package Description
rekit.logic  
rekit.logic.gameelements.entities  

  • Uses of Collidable.Optional in rekit.logic

    Methods in rekit.logic with annotations of type Collidable.Optional
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default void Collidable.collidedWithSolid​(Frame collision, Direction dir)
    Optional reaction to a collision that can be invoked in other GameElements reactToCollision().

  • Uses of Collidable.Optional in rekit.logic.gameelements.entities

    Methods in rekit.logic.gameelements.entities with annotations of type Collidable.Optional
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Entity.collidedWithSolid​(Frame collision, Direction dir)
    This implementation will ensure that no entity is able to fall through the ground or into another Object.
